Articles.Content:
Hello my fellow spacefarers!

Long time KSP enjoyer and forum lurker, first time poster here. Im using KSP for my senior college project and I'm trying to wrap my head around how FAR's log system works. Im able to see flight logs in the log file and can read the data, but I'm only getting logs for portions of the flight as opposed to the whole thing. I've tinkered with the log period and flush period numbers but to little avail. Any advice?

Also, is there an easy way to get delta V values along with the other values on the logs?

 

Lovingly yours,

-Compression Lift enjoyer
